body_html: The problems mentioned shouldn't be an issue if we just have the genrules though. If no test is linking it in (i.e. keep tests commented out for now), it shouldn't be built. If it's somehow being linked, it will be compiled at most once per run so there should be no path collisions. Do you think that would work?
body_text: The problems mentioned shouldn't be an issue if we just have the genrules though. If no test is linking it in (i.e. keep tests commented out for now), it shouldn't be built. If it's somehow being linked, it will be compiled at most once per run so there should be no path collisions. Do you think that would work?
body: The problems mentioned shouldn't be an issue if we just have the genrules though. If no test is linking it in (i.e. keep tests commented out for now), it shouldn't be built. If it's somehow being linked, it will be compiled at most once per run so there should be no path collisions. Do you think that would work?
